News.headline: Loan Announcements: Leo Donnellan and Joe Carter
News.page_title: Loan Announcements: Leo Donnellan and Joe Carter
News.URL_keywords: Loan Announcements: Leo Donnellan and Joe Carter
News.short_description: Midfielder Leo Donnellan has gone on loan to.... until the end of the season, while .... Joe Carter has joined .... on a youth experience loan until the end of the season.
News.description:
Midfielder Leo Donnellan, brother of fellow Daggers player Shaun Donnellan, signed fir the Daggers in June 2016 but has only made one apperance so far this season.

Joe Carter is part of the Dagnham and Redbridge Academy Under 18's and...............

Follow us on our Social Media sites for updates on how Donnellan and Carter are doing at their loan clubs.

Facebook: @OfficialDaggers
